jobs.jobSummary: As a project manager and process owner at Conviva, I focused on improving the onboarding process to reduce new hire difficulties and minimize turnover. I collaborated with various teams, including Helpdesk, security, field tech, and EMR, to ensure a smooth implementation. By enhancing the process, my goal was to create a positive experience for new hires, increase satisfaction, and decrease turnover. Regular reporting to the business side highlighted the progress and positive impact on turnover rate.

Proficient in Office 365 administration, Azure and Server administration, and Citrix support.
● Skilled in managing corporate computing environments and providing Tier 1 through Tier 3 technical support.
● Experienced in monitoring system performance and delivering top-notch customer service to optimize user productivity and satisfaction.

Skilled IT professional experienced in Five9, MS365, and Salesforce administration
● Optimized business operations and enhanced user productivity through technical support and customer service
● Managed user accounts and profiles, ticketing systems, and generated reports for timely issue resolution.

Monitoring the ticketing system and escalating issues to the appropriate support group
● Logging all calls and emails into the ticketing system for proper attention and follow-up
● Documenting troubleshooting steps and updating the knowledge base if necessary
● Monitoring security network alarms
● Reporting and helping to monitor all security alerts, including firewalls, UPS alerts, and server alerts.

Assisting users with daily technical issues
● Performing junior system admin tasks, including creating profiles for users through AD, MS365, Azure, and Five9
● Assisting in onboarding new users by setting up workstations and configuring new tech equipment like Crestron and network servers
● Checking the firewall and monitoring security network alerts
● Helping to control and manage Five9 services for 300+ users
● Assisting in the migration of 300+ users to an Intune environment
